duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing preventive maintenance on 300mm Semiconductor equipment.
Conducting quality checks and responding to error messages.
Reviewing Statistical Process Control charts and conducting defect troubleshooting.
Working in a cleanroom environment and wearing coveralls/bunny suit.
Training for the first 6-9 months in the form of OJT, SOP, Shadowing, Video training, and Trainer-led sessions.
Working compressed work shifts (12-hour shifts in a 3 or 4 day work week) and comfortable working day or night shifts.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED (AAS Degree or Technical Certificate a plus)
